I currently have invested $5000 in SSB and have a $100 RSP for STI ETF. I estimate around $1050 for expenses each month and was thinking of investing around $300/mth with my current salary. What would you recommend for me to invest in, with the extra $200 more per month?Feel free to let me know if $200/mth is too little, and I should consider lump sum investments too.
